title: Solving Us
description: I used to be like them.I used to be one of the pretty girls with the super hot boyfriend. I was always happy and ready for anything. Until my accident happened, and I was alone. Too ugly for the boyfriend. Never happy, and too emotionally scarred for spontaneity. You know what I was ready for? Freedom, independence, peace, and maybe one day, love.I certainly wasn’t ready for Finn.And to be honest, I’m not sure he was ready for me.
author: Susan   Renee
